Author: digiskunk
Text: I'm sorry, I don't want to be "that guy", but I don't think it's a necessarily a good thing—nor is it appropriate—to be basking in the "glory" of disordered eating and unhealthy behaviors when you're losing weight. It's nice that you're happy that you're losing weight, but posts like these can potentially encourage others to continue down the road of disordered eating. I'm not trying to be a jerk, just trying to be considerate given that this sub operates as a support group for others struggling with eating disorders.  Of course, one could argue that this sub is *loaded* with posts similar to this one, but I just felt like something had to be said.
